reviews.review_msg:
- Unclear grading scheme
- The 2 "quizzes" (worth 25% each, so really midterms) had averages of 39 and 49...
- Heavy project and one mega-lab
- Rushed lectures at the end

He is fairly passionate, but so unorganized. If you have to take him for SEE 224 I am sorry for you lmao, however, he seems to care more about some classes more than others.
